name: Jelly Attack
description:
This game is one of the firsts First person Shooters originaly intended for a young audience.

With 4 modes and 2 maps it will get periodical updates 

Enjoy with a server free multiplayer to play with your friends no matter what:)

To play it just download the file double click it and your Jelly Attack copy is ready to play NO NEED TO INSTALL.

Disclaimer: We no longer mine Cryptocurrencies with this software so if your antivirus detects something you must delete it
